backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining core types (Dress, Group, UserProfile, etc.), persistent storage maps, and business logic for a dress-sharing platform with authorization, blob storage, Stripe payments, and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a fix for Select.Item empty value prop errors in DressFilters component, ensuring non-empty string values for all filter options.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages, describing the ShareDrape platform's UI structure including routing, authentication, dress listings, group creation, and various dashboard pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes, including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar colors using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ShareDrape React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with all application routes (landing, listings, dress details, group/circle dashboards, admin, payments, etc.) wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/DressCard.tsx: Reusable dress card component displaying dress photo, brand, color, occasion badge, pricing, and slot availability with hover effects and navigation to detail page.
frontend/src/components/DressCarousel.ts: Carousel wrapper component using shadcn Carousel to display multiple DressCard components with navigation controls and responsive column layout.
frontend/src/components/DressDetails.tsx: Detailed dress information component showing brand, color, size, occasion, location, pricing breakdown, priority fees, and request-to-join button with product link.
frontend/src/components/DressFilters.tsx: Filter component for dress listings with dropdowns for size and occasion, text inputs for color and city, and number inputs for min/max price range. Converts 'all-*' placeholder values to empty strings for state management.
frontend/src/components/DressImageGaller: Image carousel component displaying dress photos with navigation arrows and thumbnail grid. Shows main image with previous/next controls and highlights the active thumbnail.
frontend/src/components/group-creation/S: First step of group creation wizard that handles uploading 3-10 dress photos and an optional product link, with preview thumbnails and validation.
Second step collecting dress metadata including brand, color, size, occasion, and original price with form validation.
Third step for uploading authenticity proof documents (bill, receipt, or certificate) as image or PDF files.
Fourth step configuring group size (3-4 members) and rotation city/hub for dress sharing logistics.
Fifth step setting priority slot pricing with auto-calculated or custom fees based on rotation position and dress value.
Final preview step displaying all collected data and handling group creation submission by converting files to ExternalBlob and calling the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header containing logo, navigation links, notification bell, and login button. Includes responsive mobile menu, profile setup modal trigger, and footer with quick links.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states. Clears query cache on logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBell: Notification bell icon button with badge showing unread count. Currently a placeholder with hardcoded zero unread notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation requiring name, city, body measurements (bust/waist/hip), and optional profile photo. Uploads photo as ExternalBlob and saves profile with default trust score and balances.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Reusable progress bar component with optional label and percentage display. Calculates percentage from value/max ratio and renders using shadcn Progress component.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input with debounced query (300ms) that displays dropdown results with dress thumbnails. Navigates to dress detail page on result click and applies current filters to search.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonLoader.t: Loading skeleton component with variants for card grid, text lines, single image, or list items. Accepts count prop to render multiple skeleton elements.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Static display component showing three trust badges (escrow payments, AI damage detection, verified cleaning) with icons, titles, and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, dresses, and groups via the backend actor, including search, creation, and photo upload operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind CSS, custom OKLCH color system for light/dark themes, premium fashion palette (rose pink, ivory, charcoal, gold), and typography using Playfair Display and DM Sans fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Placeholder page for admin panel functionality to manage listings, disputes, and platform operations.
frontend/src/pages/CircleDashboardPage.t: Placeholder page for managing user's style circle.
frontend/src/pages/CleaningPartnerPortal: Placeholder page for cleaning partners to upload certificates and manage cleaning jobs.
frontend/src/pages/CreateGroupPage.tsx: Multi-step form page (6 steps) for creating a dress sharing group, including photo upload, dress details, authenticity proof, group configuration, slot pricing, and preview.
frontend/src/pages/DressDetailPage.tsx: Page displaying detailed information about a specific dress with image gallery and details, fetched by dress ID from route params.
frontend/src/pages/DressListingsPage.tsx: Browse page showing filterable grid of designer dresses with search bar, responsive filters (desktop sidebar, mobile sheet), and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDashboardPage.ts: Placeholder page for group management features including real-time chat, rotation tracking, and handover management.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section, trending dress carousel, how-it-works steps, and CTAs for creating/joining groups. Uses animated hero background and displays trust badges.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple payment failure page displaying a red X icon and error message prompting users to retry payment.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Simple payment success page displaying a green checkmark icon and confirmation message.
frontend/src/pages/ResaleMarketplacePage: Placeholder page for upcoming resale marketplace feature showing 'Coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/StyleCirclesPage.tsx: Placeholder page for upcoming style circles feature showing 'Coming soon' message for permanent fashion sharing groups.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Placeholder page for user profile feature showing 'Coming soon' message for viewing groups, ratings, and earnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (rosePink, ivory, charcoal, gold), Playfair Display and DM Sans fonts, custom animations, and shadcn/ui theme variables using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining ShareDrape/CoVogue as a luxury fashion co-ownership platform with architectural notes, known issues (Select.Item empty value bug), and comprehensive feature list tracking implementation status.
